text:
e="preserve">Osia Lewis (December 3, 1962 – May 31, 2020) was an American professional arena football player. He played four seasons in the Arena Football League with the Chicago Bruisers and Albany Firebirds. He played college football at Oregon State University. He was born in Anchorage, Alaska.
Lewis died May 31, 2020 from liver cancer in Nashville, Tennessee, aged 57.
